name: Serdlex
description:
This is a fun little project, basically a multiplayer wordle, you can play this with your friends or family. This project is made with unity and it is open source.  https://github.com/cz-experimental-projects/serdlex It currently does not have builtin modding support, but with the system I have setup, I wouldn't imagine it to be hard to code your own custom game modes.

Heads Up: There is 2 quotes from urban dictionary in the main menu that contains inappropriate language as of Version 0.8
